## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

-   [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
-   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
-   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
-   [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
-   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
-   [ ] I have run `cargo clippy` and resolved all warnings
-   [ ] I have run `cargo fmt` to format Rust code
-   [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed all issues

### Testing

-   [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
-   [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
-   [ ] I have tested this on multiple platforms (if applicable)

### Documentation

-   [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
-   [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `/docs` (if applicable)
-   [ ] I have added/updated code comments and doc strings
-   [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Database Changes (if applicable)

-   [ ] I have created/updated database migrations
-   [ ] I have tested the migration on a fresh database
-   [ ] I have tested the migration on an existing database with data
-   [ ] I have documented any schema changes

### Breaking Changes (if applicable)

-   [ ] I have documented all breaking changes
-   [ ] I have provided migration instructions
-   [ ] I have updated the version number according to semver
